resources.string: Tocca il riquadro con due dita per spostarlo e ridimensionarlo.
Ottimo! Tocca con due dita per nascondere l\'interfaccia di modifica.
Tocca il riquadro con tre dita per nasconderlo temporaneamente. Rimarrà nascosto fino a quando non spegnerai e riaccenderai il display.

Lockscren Widgets richiede di attivare il Servizio di Accessibilità per apparire nella schermata di blocco e il centro notifiche. Nessun dato viene raccolto, e nessuna azione verrà eseguita sul dispositivo.
Are you sure you want to remove this item?
Follow me on Mastodon for updates about my apps and random development-related nonsense.
Check out my website if you\'re that bored.
Send me an email if you have a question or problem. Please include as much detail as possible. Just telling me \"it doesn\'t work\" just wastes everyone\'s time.
Lockscreen Widgets is open source! If you\'re a developer or tinkerer interested in helping to improve the project (or you just want to check out the source), tap here.
For $1 every month, you get access to all of my paid apps, along with some exclusive stuff.

The Accessibility Service isn\'t currently running. This may be because you need to allowlist Lockscreen Widgets from your phone\'s battery optimizations, or you may just need to toggle it off and on again in Settings.
Lockscreen Widgets doesn\'t collect any data beyond what\'s needed for crash analysis. Learn more below.
Lockscreen Widgets doesn\'t collect any data beyond what\'s needed for crash analysis. Tap here to learn more.
Hide the widget frame while there are notifications being shown. This requires the use of a Notification Listener Service. You don\'t have to grant this permission right now.
Try to hide the widget frame when the notification shade is pulled down. This may not work on all devices.
Try to hide the widget frame when the PIN/pattern/password input view is shown. This may not work on all devices.
Animate the showing/hiding of the widget frame.
Turn this on to create verbose logs of Lockscreen Widgets\' state.
Export debug logs to a file.
Overlay the widget frame with a list of View IDs it detects on the current screen. Useful for debugging and finding IDs that can be used to detect various lock screen states.

Sets the delay between Accessibility Events that Lockscreen Widgets responds to. Shorter values mean the frame will respond faster to changes, at the potential cost of device performance and battery life.

Lockscreen Widgets will hide itself when these IDs are not on-screen. You can find which IDs should go here by enabling both Debug switches and looking at the IDs that are highlighted in red when you want the frame to be hidden.

Lockscreen Widgets will hide itself when these IDs are on-screen. You can find which IDs should go here by enabling both Debug switches and looking at the IDs that are highlighted in green when you want the frame to be hidden.
Show when Notification Shade is Fully Expanded
Attivare questa opzione farà apparire il riquadro quando il centro notifiche viene aperto. Questa condizione ha posizionamento e dimensioni indipendenti.
Mostra nella schermata di blocco principale

Se stai usando l\'opzione per mostrare Lockscreen Widgets nel centro notifiche, potresti non volerlo nella schermata di blocco principale. Disattiva questa opzione per mostrare il riquadro solo quando il centro notifiche è aperto.
Modifica l\'arrotondamento degli angoli del riquadro.
Modifica l\'arrotondamento degli angoli dei widget.
Imposta il colore di sfondo del riquadro, inclusa la trasparenza.

La Modalità Maschera tenterà di utilizzare il wallpaper come sfondo del riquadro. Su dispositivi compatibili, darà al riquadro un aspetto trasparente permettendo comunque di sovrapporre gli elementi dell\'interfaccia utente.
Alcuni dispositivi attenuano leggermente il wallpaper della schermata di blocco. Regola questo per farlo combaciare.
Ignora i tocchi sul riquadro quando il sensore di prossimità è coperto.
Se Lockscreen Widgets rileva che un widget sta avviando un\'app, richiederà di sbloccare il dispositivo e chiudere il centro notifiche. Disattiva questa opzione per impedire questo comportamento.
Nascondi il riquadro quando la schermata FaceWidget viene aperta, nota anche come schermata Now Bar estesa su One UI 7 e versioni successive.
Nasconde il riquadro quando il dispositivo è in Modalità Orizzontale.
Posizione Centro Notifiche indipendente quando bloccato
Su One UI 3, la disposizione del centro notifiche è leggermente diversa quando bloccato e sbloccato. Attiva questo per posizionare il riquadro in maniera indipendente fra le due modalità.
Quando attivato, il riquadro ignorerà i tocchi diretti. Non potrai spostare o modificare i widget dal riquadro, ma potrai nasconderlo toccandolo con tre dita e interagire con i widget.
Quando attivato, i tocchi sui widget verranno ignorati. Impedirà l\'avvio accidentale delle app, ma anche l\'interazione con i widget.
Quando attivato, la disposizione del cassetto verrà bloccata. Non potrai rimuovere, ridimensionare, o riordinare i widget, ma potrai comunque interagirvi.
Imposta la durata totale della dissolvenza.
Effettua un backup dei widget e delle scorciatoie attuale. Non include i tile dei widget.
Ripristina widget e scorciatoie da un backup, sostituendo quelli attuali. Non include i tile dei widget.

Su dispositivi Samsung e a partire da Android 12, è possibile sfocare lo sfondo del riquadro. Non si applica in Modalità Maschera e potrebbe non funzionare su tutti dispositivi o in modalità risparmio energetico.
Su dispositivi Samsung e a partire da Android 12, è possibile sfocare lo sfondo del cassetto. Potrebbe non funzionare su tutti dispositivi o in modalità risparmio energetico.
Imposta il livello di sfocatura dello sfondo.

Per impostazione predefinita, Lockscreen Widgets ricorderà l\'ultima pagina mostrata a schermo e scorrerà automaticamente in quella posizione. Disattiva questo per mostrare invece sempre la prima pagina quando Lockscreen Widgets viene visualizzato.
Nasconde il riquadro quando i Pannelli Edge di Samsung sono aperti.
Scegli con quali app il riquadro deve nascondersi se vengono mostrate nella schermata di blocco.
Imposta posizioni e dimensioni alternative per il riquadro in Modalità Orizzontale.

Quando i widget vengono mostrati, non sempre vengono aggiornati. Per impostazione predefinita, Lockscreen Widget aggira il problema ricaricando tutti widget, il che può causare un breve sfarfallamento. Disattiva questo per evitare la sfarfallamento, ma i widget potrebbero non aggiornarsi.
Hide the widget frame when the software keyboard is currently visible on screen.
Double-tap an empty space (outside of a widget) to turn off the screen. This applies to the whole frame when \"Ignore Widget Touches\" is enabled.
Double-tap an empty space (outside of a widget) to turn off the screen.
Lockscreen Widgets is a simple app with a simple purpose: to bring back Android KitKat\'s lock screen widgets. Your widgets will show up in a simple paged slider on the lockscreen.

Tap the \"plus\" page to add a widget, press and hold to reorder/resize/remove widgets in the list, and tap anywhere on the frame with two fingers to move/resize the frame or add a widget. You can also tap with three fingers to hide the widget frame until the screen is turned off and on again.
To be able to display on the lock screen, you\'ll need to activate Lockscreen Widgets\' Accessibility Service. This app doesn\'t collect any data from your screen.
Lockscreen Widgets can hide the widget frame while there are notifications displayed. To do so, you\'ll need to enable the Notification Listener. You don\'t have to grant this right now.

Lockscreen Widgets has a \"masking\" mode, where it will use your wallpaper as the widget frame background, causing it to seem transparent, while also being able to cover lock screen elements. To do this, Lockscreen Widgets needs permission to be able to read your device\'s storage. You don\'t have to grant this right now. If you\'re running Lollipop, this permission is already granted. More details are available in the privacy policy.
On Android 13 and later, you will need to use Shizuku to grant the required permissions.

Many devices, including those running MIUI and EMUI, have incredibly aggressive battery management. This can cause Lockscreen Widgets to be killed when you don\'t want it to be. Click the button below to read how you can allowlist Lockscreen Widgets on your particular device.

Lockscreen Widgets supports adding frames to multiple displays, but Motorola blocks secondary display access to third party apps by default on the Razr models. Tap below to open the screen where you can grant permission to Lockscreen Widgets to use the cover display. Once there, find Lockscreen Widgets in the list, tap it, and enable \"Allow on external display\".
That\'s it! Check your lock screen and you should now see the widget frame!

Adding a widget can be done in one of three ways. If the widget pager doesn\'t have any widgets added, simply press the \"plus\" button that appears inside it. Otherwise, you can tap the frame with two fingers and then tap the \"plus\" button on the top right of the frame. You can also add a widget from the app itself, by tapping the \"plus\" button at the top right of the main screen.
If the frame is in the way, or you want it to be a different size, you can easily move and resize it. Simply tap the frame itself with two fingers to show the editing interface.

If you need to just hide the widget frame for a while, tap it with three fingers. You can also enter the editing interface with a two-finger tap and press the eye button in the top left. This will hide the frame until the screen is turned off and on again.
To change the order of the widgets, simply long-press the widget you want to move and drag it to where you want it to be.

To remove a widget, long-press it without dragging and tap the red button that appears in the top right. Long-pressing a widget will also show four \"draggers\" around the edges, which you can use to resize the widget.

All phones are different, and it\'s possible that the built-in hiding options don\'t work on your device. Or maybe you want to implement a hiding behavior of your own. This can be implemented with the \"Hide on Present IDs\" and \"Hide on Non-Present IDs\" options. Any IDs you add to the former will cause the widget frame to hide when Lockscreen Widgets detects any of those IDs on-screen. Any IDs you add to the latter will cause the widget frame to hide when Lockscreen Widgets does not detect any of those IDs on-screen. You can find out which IDs should be added by enabling both Debug options and seeing which IDs are highlighted in green or red.

On Samsung One UI devices, you can run a limited subset of widgets using your QS tiles. Add the Lockscreen Widgets tiles to your quick settings, and tap the text of the tile to get started. Widgets that involve dynamic lists, like email or calendar widgets, likely won\'t work. This isn\'t something that can be fixed.
Unable to configure the widget %s due to lack of permissions. Please contact the app developer or device manufacturer.
Unable to bind the widget %s due to lack of permissions. Please contact the app developer or device manufacturer.
Please enable the debug log option to see IDs here.
Touch protection active. Please uncover the proximity sensor.
The Accessibility Service hasn\'t started yet. Please wait.
Quando attivato, il cassetto verrà chiuso toccando fuori dall\'area di qualsiasi widget.
Aggiunge una maniglia a lato dello schermo che permette di aprire il cassetto facendola scorrere.
Mostra un\'ombra dietro la maniglia del cassetto.
Imposta l\'altezza della maniglia del cassetto.
Imposta la larghezza della maniglia del cassetto. Può essere utile negli schermi con angoli arrotondati.
Imposta il colore della maniglia del cassetto.
Imposta il colore di sfondo del cassetto.
Choose how many columns the drawer layout should have.
Set how much space should show between the sides of the screen and the edges of the outer widgets.
Dismiss the widget drawer when the notification panel is expanded behind it.
Single-tapping the handle will open the drawer immediately instead of requiring a drag or a double tap.
Prevents the drawer handle from being moved.
Show the blur effect over the status bar area.
Show Background Color Over Status Bar
Show the drawer\'s background color on top of the status bar. If you have an opaque background color, you may want to consider turning this off.
Only show the drawer handle when the device is on the lock screen.
Lockscreen Widgets uses Bugsnag to collect anonymous crash reports. Not that to fully disable collection, you\'ll have to force stop and reopen Lockscreen Widgets.
Choose an icon pack for shortcut icons. This applies to both the frame and the drawer.
Are you sure you want to reset the position and size?

When enabled, Lockscreen Widgets will use Android\'s API to check whether a widget tap is launching an Activity. This can be faster than Lockscreen Widgets\' built-in detection, but may cause false positives.
Help translate Lockscreen Widgets into your language.
Are you sure you want to remove this frame?

It looks like you\'re using a device that restricts ADB\'s ability to grant permissions. The setting to allow this should be in Developer Options and called something similar to \"Disable Permission Monitoring\", \"USB Debugging (Security Setting)\", or \"Disable Permission Monitoring\". Once you\'ve toggled that option, come back here to try again.

On foldable devices, the default display generally switches between the internal and external display depending on whether the device is open or closed. On flip devices, it\'s generally always the internal display.
